comment.text: This translation key is used to display the string "in the left panel" in a checkbox label within the Portal Settings page, specifically under the "Developer Tools" preset. It appears alongside checkboxes for other options and provides context about the checkbox's purpose.

usage.context:
onChange={() => {}}
 isChecked
 />
 <RowContainer>
 <Checkbox label={t("Chat")} onChange={() => {}} isChecked />
 <Text color="gray">({t("InLeftPanel")})</Text>
 </RowContainer>
 <RowContainer>
 <Checkbox label={t("FeedbackAndSupport")} onChange={() => {}} isChecked />
 <Text color="gray">({t("InLeftPanel")})</Text>
 </RowContainer>

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While '左パネルで' (hidari panel de) literally translates to 'in the left panel,' it can sound a bit unnatural in many contexts. A more natural phrasing would depend on the surrounding text. '左側のパネルで' (hidari no panel de) is often a better alternative as it explicitly indicates 'the left panel.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider '左側のパネルで' (hidari no panel de) or a phrase more appropriate for the surrounding context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ທາງຊ້າຍມື' literally means 'on the right hand'. The English phrase 'in the left panel' refers to the left side of a panel.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ທາງກໍານົດມື

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "වම්පස මඬලෙහි" is a literal translation, it's quite formal and doesn't flow naturally in most modern contexts. "in the left panel" often refers to a user interface element. A more natural and commonly used translation would be something like "මැහුලෙහි වම්පස" or "වම් පැත්තේ".
The term 'මඬලෙහි' is grammatically correct, but sounds overly formal.  It's more common to use a less formal construction.

The translation 'у левом панелу' is grammatically correct but doesn't convey the precise meaning of 'in the left panel'. A more accurate translation would be 'на левом панелу' to indicate location on the left panel.

While "trong bảng điều khiển bên trái" is understandable, a more natural and precise translation of "in the left panel" would be "ở bảng điều khiển bên trái" or "trong bảng điều khiển trái". The use of 'trong' can imply being contained within, which might not always be the intended meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ở bảng điều khiển bên trái
